title: Super Sexy, Super Fly
itunes:title: Super Sexy, Super Fly
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 44 years old and I have met the love of my life but it took me 3 years to get used to him. We met in the mall 3 years ago on a Saturday. I remember the day in full detail. He was wearing a matching short set with knee socks and he had a brim on. He asked me where the Florsheim store was and I had to google it because I had never heard of it. He was an older man so I walked over to the concierge’s desk with him to see if there is such a store. The concierge said that the store closed a while ago and this man looked defeated...............

content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m 44 years old and I have met the love of my life but it took me 3 years to get used to him. We met in the mall 3 years ago on a Saturday. I remember the day in full detail. He was wearing a matching short set with knee socks and he had a brim on. He asked me where the Florsheim store was and I had to google it because I had never heard of it. He was an older man so I walked over to the concierge’s desk with him to see if there is such a store. The concierge said that the store closed a while ago and this man looked defeated...............
